metadata.title: CVE-2023-25735 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-compartment wrappers wrapping a scripted proxy could have causedobjects from other compartments to be stored in the main compartmentresulting in a use-after-free after unwrapping the proxy. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 110, Thunderbird < 102.8, and Firefox ESR <102.8.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
